title: How to Make Fish Nuggets (Large Quantity Recipe)

steps.headline: Combine bread crumbs and salt in a large bowl.
Add low-fat yogurt, or reduced calorie salad dressing or low-fat mayonnaise to another large bowl.
Cut up fish fillets, if needed, then dip in yogurt, or salad dressing, or mayonnaise.
Place fish in bread crumbs and turn to coat well.
Spray a 13 x 18 x 1-inch pan with nonstick cooking spray.
steps.description: You could also place the fish on 10 x 15 jelly roll pans or a large roasting pan.

steps.headline: Bake 13 to 17 minutes or until fish fillets are golden brown and have reached 145 °F (63 °C) for at least 15 seconds.
Serve 2 portions of fish to each diner.

text: Preheat oven to 500 °F (260 °C).  Combine bread crumbs and salt in a large bowl.  Add low-fat yogurt, or reduced calorie salad dressing or low-fat mayonnaise to another large bowl.  Cut up fish fillets, if needed, then dip in yogurt, or salad dressing, or mayonnaise.  Place fish in bread crumbs and turn to coat well.  Spray a 13 x 18 x 1-inch pan with nonstick cooking spray. You could also place the fish on 10 x 15 jelly roll pans or a large roasting pan. Bake 13 to 17 minutes or until fish fillets are golden brown and have reached 145 °F (63 °C) for at least 15 seconds.  Serve 2 portions of fish to each diner.
